content: i ve had many people email me and tell me i bought your scurvy pirate pattern but i made it into an anime character i like or i bought your boy wizard pattern and made it look like c3po so i thought if people are going to be so creative on their own why not make it easier on them so i made this basic character doll pattern this is not exactly the same pattern as the pirate and wizard i ve made the head separate from the body for this pattern but otherwise it s all the same just the basics
